messages.title: Ryan Henson leads NHS Funding Campaign for Bedford and Kempston
messages.content: The Conservative MP Candidate for Bedford and Kempston is leading the campaign to make sure Bedford receives its share of the record new NHS funding announced by Prime Minister Boris Johnson.

messages.title: Boris 'listens' as Ryan leads local education campaign
messages.content: After leading a campaign this summer to fight for more Government funding for schools in Bedford and Kempston, Conservative MP Candidate Ryan Henson has welcomed the Prime Minister's plan and promises to help schools better fund.

messages.title: Supporting our town centre
messages.content: Ryan Henson, the local campaigner hoping to be the next Member of Parliament for Bedford and Kempston, has been working to make sure enough is done to support Bedford town centre.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More police with extra resources to cut crime
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Government is committed to recruiting 20,000 new officers, with over 400 new officers across Bedfordshire.
Increasing funding for local schools and boosting investment in further education.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: More money for our NHS and local support services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A £13 billion investment accompanied by a funding increase to ensure Bedford gets its fair share.

issues.brexitEurope: Ryan Henson urges Cabinet Minister to support local businesses and listen to Bedford and Kempston residents about Brexit.
issues.economy: Ryan wins up to £25 million investment for Town Centre.
issues.education: Ryan wrote to the PM to urge that local schools be better funded.
issues.health: The Conservative MP Candidate for Bedford and Kempston is leading the campaign to make sure Bedford receives its share of the record new NHS funding.
issues.lawCrime: The Government is committed to recruiting 20,000 new officers to cut crime.

community.content: Ryan Henson participates in litter picking in Kempston.

politicalExperience.achievements: Secured investment and led local initiatives.

endorsements.endorsement: We need an MP who will be the voice for those most vulnerable in society who need it most. That's why I'm supporting Ryan.

quotes.text: We need an MP who will be the voice for those most vulnerable in society who need it most. That's why I'm supporting Ryan.

images.caption: Ryan Henson leading the campaign for NHS funding.
Ryan meets with Veterans Minister to discuss support for Armed Forces.
Ryan Henson working with local community members on initiatives like litter picking.

examples: Ryan Henson's involvement in local issues like litter picking demonstrates his local commitment.
